item.title: GM pulls guidance, halts stock buyback amid talk of tariff relief for carmakers
item.description: General Motors reported first-quarter results before market open Tuesday but has postponed its call with analysts until Thursday.

item.title: America’s growth mirage: As tariffs hit, the economy is already running on fumes
item.description: Investors are looking for safe havens. Here’s one not to overlook — especially if interest rates fall.

item.title: Here’s how much money Shedeur Sanders lost out on by falling to the fifth round of the NFL draft
item.description: Sanders was once projected to go as high as No. 1 overall, with No. 3 overall to the New York Giants seemingly as low as he could go.

item.title: My boyfriend owns a house and earns more than me, but I won’t marry him without a prenup. Is that wise?
item.description: “I recently learned about land that has been in my family for 150 years.”

item.title: Trump’s first 100 days in office are worst for stock market in half a century
item.description: U.S. stocks are on pace for the worst stretch over the first 100 days of a new presidential term since 1973.
